title: Part a. [0–1]
stimulusHtml:
1 point

• One point is earned for stating that there is no impact and for explaining that only the composition of the MS changes.
descriptions:
Earns neither of the following 1 points

• One point is earned for stating that there is no impact and for explaining that only the composition of the MS changes.

Earns 1 of the following 1 points

• One point is earned for stating that there is no impact and for explaining that only the composition of the MS changes.

title: Part b. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

• One point is earned for indicating $7,200 and for showing work.

• One point is earned for indicating $36,000 and for showing work.
descriptions:
Earns neither of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for indicating $7,200 and for showing work.

• One point is earned for indicating $36,000 and for showing work.

Earns 1 of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for indicating $7,200 and for showing work.

• One point is earned for indicating $36,000 and for showing work.

Earns 2 of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for indicating $7,200 and for showing work.

• One point is earned for indicating $36,000 and for showing work.

title: Part c. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

• One point is earned for stating that money supply increases.

• One point is earned for stating that money demand increases because income increases.
descriptions:
Earns neither of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for stating that money supply increases.

• One point is earned for stating that money demand increases because income increases.

Earns 1 of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for stating that money supply increases.

• One point is earned for stating that money demand increases because income increases.

Earns 2 of the following 2 points

• One point is earned for stating that money supply increases.

• One point is earned for stating that money demand increases because income increases.
